name: Relic Song
summary: Deals damage, and has a 10% chance of putting the target to sleep. It also changes Meloetta's form depending on what it is now.
viability: Relic Song is the only way for Meloetta to switch forms, so this move is a must if you want to utilize Meloetta-Pirouette. It also has a 20% chance to put the target to sleep due to Meloetta's Serene Grace ability, which can be useful.
